species.name: aipom
descriptions: Aipom’s tail ends in a hand-like appendage that can be cleverly manipulated. However, because the Pokémon uses its tail so much, its real hands have become rather clumsy.
As it did more and more with its tail, its hands became clumsy. It makes its nest high in the treetops.
It lives atop giant trees. It wraps its tail around a branch so it won’t fall off while asleep.
It lives high among the treetops. It can use its tail as freely and cleverly as its hands.
It searches for prey from the tops of trees. When it spots its favorite food, Bounsweet, Aipom gets excited and pounces.

abilities.name: run-away
abilities.effect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.

abilities.name: pickup
abilities.effect: Picks up other Pokémon's used and Flung held items.  May also pick up an item after battle.

abilities.name: skill-link
abilities.effect: Extends two-to-five-hit moves and triple kick to their full length every time.
